Join the

Red Brick Winery Wine Club

Get Started!

Welcome to the Red Brick Winery Wine Club – where every bottle tells a story, and every member becomes part of our family. Our wine club is more than just a subscription—it’s a lifestyle choice for those who appreciate the finer things. As a member, you not only receive exceptional wines delivered right to your doorstep but also receive exclusive perks and gain access to a world of exceptional experiences.

CLUB MEMBERS ENJOY WINE DISCOUNTS AND PRIORITY RESERVATIONS
FOR ALL OF OUR EVENTS

Curated Shipments 3x per year

Priority Privileges on new releases

Exclusive Member events & tastings

Wine Pairing And Cooking classes

Host Private Events at red brick

Ride the Red Brick wine train

Guided Wine Trips to Napa Valley

Discounted Shipping & Tastings

Discounts on Your Purchases

Choose the Perfect Membership for You

We know that wine preferences are as unique as the people who enjoy them. That’s why we offer a variety of wine club memberships to suit every taste. Whether you prefer rich reds, refreshing whites, or a mix of both, there’s a membership that fits your lifestyle. Join our wine club today, and let’s make your wine experience truly unforgettable all year long.

Join The Club

How the Wine Club Works

Joining the Red Brick Winery Wine Club is simple and tailored to fit your lifestyle. Here’s how it works:

Step-by-Step Guide to Membership

STEP 1

Choose the wine club membership that suits your style.

STEP 2

Complete our quick and easy online registration form.

STEP 3

Set your wine preferences to ensure each shipment is perfect for you.

STEP 4

Relax and enjoy your curated wine selections, delivered every quarter.

Our Finest Wine Collections

Our collection grants you access to prized Napa Valley’s selections—from limited-release vintages and handpicked blends to private tastings and exclusive cellar experiences. Enjoy priority access to new releases, expert wine curation, and personalized tastings that create memories.

Explore Our Wines

Wine Club Member

Wine Club Member

I look forward to my wine shipments every quarter. The selection is always top-notch, and I love the special events—they’re truly a highlight!

Frequently Asked Questions
(FAQs)

The cost for Wine Club membership varies by level. As a member, you only pay for the wines in your shipments, which arrive three times a year, plus any shipping costs. See above for our Silver Brick, Gold Brick and Red Brick membership packages and approximate costs per shipment to select the perfect membership for you. You can always adjust your membership level (number of bottles) and preferences for your mix of white and red wines to suit your tastes.

Yes! You can easily customize your shipments by selecting your favorite wines, whether you prefer reds, whites, or a mix of both.

Yes, you can cancel your wine club membership anytime, no questions asked. Just contact us, and we’ll take care of it. See above for our Silver Brick, Gold Brick and Red Brick membership packages and approximate costs per shipment to select the perfect membership for you. You can always adjust your membership level (number of bottles) and preferences for your mix of white and red wines to suit your tastes.

You’ll receive wine shipments three times a year. We will contact you in advance of each shipment to share the wines we will be including and the exact costs for that shipment.

We offer all Wine Club Members priority privileges such as reservations for member-only events, including private tastings, winemaker dinners, and wine trains, as well as first tastings, Additionally, all Wine Club Members are notified of new releases before the general public and offered the opportunity to taste first).

Yes! Members enjoy up to 20% discounts on wines and winery merchandise (varies by membership level), plus access to special offers such as 20% off tasting flights for you and your guests each time you visit Red Brick Winery.

We have tasting rooms in Napa, California, and Glen Mills, Pennsylvania. Visit us for wine tastings and events at both locations.

You can choose from red wines, white wines, or a mix of both. We tailor the experience to fit your taste.

Yes! We offer custom wine labels for personal orders or special occasions.

Ready to Join the Red Brick Winery Wine Club?

Don’t miss out on this unique opportunity to become a part of the Red Brick Winery family. Experience the convenience of having our premium wines delivered right to your doorstep, along with exclusive access to events and special perks. Click the button below to join our wine club today!
